definitions.definition: ( Christianity ) A painted, stamped or carved tablet with a representation of Christ or the Virgin Mary, which was kissed by the priest during the Mass ("kiss of peace") and then passed to other officiating clergy and the congregation to be kissed. See also osculatory .
( British , dated , school slang ) Friendship ; truce .
examples: to be good pax (i.e., good friends)

definitions.definition: ( Christianity ) A crucifix , a tablet with the image of Christ on the cross upon it, or a reliquary .
( history ) Any of several notable periods of peace in human history , particularly owing to unquestionable hegemony on the model of the Pax Romana .

definitions.definition: A guest (at an event or function).
definitions.label_groups: informal , usually in the plural , by extension , hospitality industry

definitions.definition: A restaurant guest , when counting; person .
definitions.label_groups: Malaysia , Singapore , Philippines , by extension , restaurant industry

main_definition: ( informal , usually in the plural ) A passenger ; passengers .
secondary_definitions: ( informal , usually in the plural , by extension , hospitality industry ) A guest (at an event or function).
( Malaysia , Singapore , Philippines , by extension , restaurant industry ) A restaurant guest , when counting; person .
